Title: Object: La fuga di Cristo in Egitto
Series: Raccolta di 112 stampe di pitture della storia sacra
Description: The flight into Egypt, after Luca Giordano, with the Holy Family in a boat maneuvered by a man standing on the left side; the Virgin sits on the right and suckles Christ Child; behind her, an angel holds the donkey's reins, and St Joseph stands at centre, leaning on a walking stick Etching and engraving
Curator's comments: See 1865,0520.773 for comment on series. For painting (in Istitute Leone XIII dei Padri Gesuiti, Milan) see Ferrari/Scavizzi, 'Luca Giordano, l'Opera Completa', 1992, No. A251.
Previous owner: Previous owner/ex-collection: A E Evans & Sons (sale Sotheby's, 24-7.iv.1865/970)
